se.swedenconnect.security.credential.nimbus
Nimbus add-ons for credentials support.

  • Uses of JwkTransformerFunction in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.nimbus

    Methods in se.swedenconnect.security.credential.nimbus that return JwkTransformerFunction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.function()
    Creates a JwkTransformerFunction with default settings.
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.publicJwk()
    Customizes the function so that it creates a "public" JWK, i.e., not containing private key material.
    static JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.publicJwkFunction()
    Creates a JwkTransformerFunction that creates a "public" JWK, i.e., not containing private key material.
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.serializable()
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    the KeyStore is no longer used in the function, and therefore does nothing
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withAlgorithmFunction(Function<PkiCredential,Algorithm> algorithmFunction)
    Customizes this function with a function that returns the JOSE algorithm.
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withEcKeyCustomizer(Function<ECKey.Builder,ECKey.Builder> customizer)
    Customizes this function with a generic function that may modify EC keys.
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withKeyIdFunction(Function<PkiCredential,String> keyIdFunction)
    Customizes the function with a custom function for calculating the key ID property (JWK kid property).
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withKeyOpsFunction(Function<PkiCredential,Set<KeyOperation>> keyOpsFunction)
    Customizes this function with a function that returns a set of KeyOperations.
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withKeyUseFunction(Function<PkiCredential,KeyUse> keyUseFunction)
    Customizes this function with a function for getting the key use property (JWK use property).
    JwkTransformerFunction
    JwkTransformerFunction.withRsaCustomizer(Function<RSAKey.Builder,RSAKey.Builder> customizer)
    Customizes this function with a generic function that may modify RSA keys.
